sources.name: MIMSExcel
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  MIMSExcel

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MIMSExcel = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://smpkpi.blob.core.windows.net/mims/Core_KPI_File_allloads_Nov01_2021_to_Nov30_2021.xlsx"),
  Excel = Excel.Workbook(AdfDoc),
  ExcelSheet = Excel{[Item = "11-1-2021 to 11-30-2021", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data],
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(ExcelSheet, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MIMSExcel,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"CoopID", "CoopName", "ProdID", "ProdName", "ManifestNum", "LT_No", "CustID", "CustName", "HaulerID", "HaulerName", "ScaleHeavy", "SchPickUpDate", "ActualPickUpDate", "SchDeliveryDate", "ActualDeliveryDate", "RouteNum", "Rejected"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"ActualPickUpDate", type datetime}, {"SchDeliveryDate", type datetime}, {"ActualDeliveryDate", type datetime}, {"SchPickUpDate", type datetime}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
